subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox powered their way to victory behind home runs by Daniel Nava, Xander Bogaerts and Mookie Betts, hardly the familiar cast of sluggers Boston has brought to bear during the rivalry.
snippet: The Red Sox powered their way to victory behind home runs by Daniel Nava, Xander Bogaerts and Mookie Betts, hardly the familiar cast of sluggers Boston has brought to bear during the rivalry.
